about_the_game:
XR22-SEAGUARD is a PC and VR game that is an immersive version of the classic game 'Battleship'. It has impressive graphics and realistic sound effects. Players can play against AI opponents or challenge other players in different game modes.

The game is set in an industrial building and the playfields are 85 meters long, 51 meters wide, and 38 meters high. The main props include a 42 square meter pool, four different warship models to represent each player's ships, two missile launchers, an air defense system, and industrial fans that can be turned on and off. There is also an 18-meter-high elevator that leads to the Control Center, which has holographic displays and two grid panels for strategic information.
Players take turns placing their ships on a grid and try to sink their opponent's fleet by guessing their ship locations.

XR22-SEAGUARD has different types of ships, including Carrier (5 squares), Battleship (4 squares), Cruiser (3 squares), and Submarine (2 squares). It offers various game modes, including single-player challenges and multiplayer experiences. The online multiplayer feature allows players from different PC storefronts to play together.

short_description: XR22-SEAGUARD is a PC and VR game that reimagines the classic grid-based game of Battleship. This immersive PC and VR game puts you in the heart of a dynamic 3D industrial environment, where you'll strategically place and sink ships using state-of-the-art weapons and defenses.
